title: Ground Pork Tacos with Pineapple Salsa

Ingredients.2: 1 tablespoon soy-based liquid seasoning (such as Maggi® Jugo)

Ingredients.8: 1 small jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced

Directions.1: Combine ground pork, liquid seasoning, ground chipotle powder, and garlic in a bowl. Set aside for flavors to meld.

Directions.2: Combine pineapple, red onion, jalapeno, cilantro, lime juice, and salt in a bowl. Set pineapple salsa aside.

Directions.3: Preheat a large skillet over high heat. Crumble ground pork into the hot skillet. Cook and stir until pork is completely browned and edges begin to crisp, 7 to 10 minutes. Drain any excess grease. Place pork in a bowl and keep warm. Wipe out skillet.

Directions.4: Warm tortillas in skillet over medium-low heat, about 20 seconds per side. Divide meat mixture between tortillas and top with pineapple salsa
